class.name: GSAISeparation
class.brief_description: Calculates an acceleration that repels the agent from its neighbors in the given GSAIProximity.
class.description: Calculates an acceleration that repels the agent from its neighbors in the given GSAIProximity. _callback is the callback for the proximity to call when finding neighbors. Determines the amount of acceleration that neighbor imposes based on its distance from the owner agent.

members.member: The acceleration is an average based on all neighbors, multiplied by a strength decreasing by the inverse square law in relation to distance, and it accumulates.
The coefficient to calculate how fast the separation strength decays with distance.
